Pleasing The Pearlescent Illuminating Serum

Brand: Pleasing

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water/Eau/Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Phenoxy- ethanol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Agar, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Xanthan Gum, PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer, Beta-Glucan, Propanediol, Bis-PE

Propanediol, Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane, Panthenol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Algin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Menthyl Lactate, Ethyl Menthane Carboxamide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/ Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer

rylic Acid Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Disodium EDTA, Tin Oxide (CI 77861).

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
